summary: Lola Bunny invents a perfume with the adverse effect of turning people invisible, sending her and cab driver Bugs Bunny on the run from the FBI, while another shady group seeks the formula.
cast: Fred Armisen|Bob Bergen|Jeff Bergman|Jess Harnell|Damon Jones|Maurice LaMarche|Rob Paulsen|Ariane Price|Rachel Ramras|Jim Rash|Michael Serrato|Billy West
title: Looney Tunes: Un perfume nunca visto
